sentences.sContent: We must encourage innovation if the company is to remain competitive.
sentences.sCn: 公司要想保持竞争力，就必须鼓励革新。

sentences.sContent: ...There is strong evidence that both innovation and adoption of cleaner technology are strongly encouraged by higher fossil fuel prices...
...By raising relative demand for clean energy sources，a carbon price would also help align the market return to clean-energy innovation with its social return...
...low fossil fuel prices could discourage further innovation in...
...Higher fossil fuel prices prove to be conducive to innovation and application of cleaner technology...
...you managed the innovation project at CucinTech...
...Was innovation at the core of the project...
...Chinese entrepreneurs are also striving to be pioneers in innovation to satisfy the changing and growing demands of both domestic and foreign consumer markets...
...What exactly is strategic innovation then...
...It's a plan to rebuild our infrastructure and keep us on the cutting edge of innovation and clean energy...
...Does innovation on this scale really give a competitive advantage...
...instead of innovation for innovation's sake and new products being created simply because the technology is there...
...Strategic innovation is the process of managing innovation...
...Pretty much every proposed innovation found in the health policy literature these days is contained in these measures...
...that innovation may frequently lead to imitation...
...innovation is a vital contributing factor to business success...
...that doesn't necessarily mean that innovation has stopped...
...anyone who participates in the innovation process should be rewarded...
...innovation is an important force that pushes our society forward...
...innovation matters enormously to an organization or a country...
...we are in urgent need of an education system that stresses innovation over mechanical learning...
...But while much of the research and innovation has concentrated on finding less-polluting energy alternatives...
...innovation and job growth...
...We should take this concern seriously as universities are key in the national innovation system...

remMethod.val: in(进入) ＋ nov(新的) ＋ ation → 革新

words.tran: 革新的；富有革新精神的

trans.tranOther: a new idea, method, or invention
